summary: Search and Navigation feature mostly works as designed. File search, partial text search, alphabetical sorting, date sorting, special character search, and folder navigation all work correctly. However, folder name search is not supported (only file search), and Z-A sort and Sort by Size options are not available in the UI.

test_scenarios.name: Search files by name
test_scenarios.description: Search for files using their name
test_scenarios.expected: Files containing 'cavalier' in name should be displayed
test_scenarios.actual: Found 3 files: cavalier-tv.png, cavalier-tv-thumb-120.png, cavalier-tv-thumb-171.png. Search term highlighted in filenames.

test_scenarios.name: Search folders by name
test_scenarios.description: Search for folders using their name
steps: Enter 'Images' in search box (name of existing folder)
test_scenarios.expected: Folder named 'Images' should appear in results
test_scenarios.actual: Search returned files containing 'image' in name (batch_image_3.png, test_image.png, etc.) but did NOT return the 'Images' folder. Search only works for files, not folders.
test_scenarios.notes: By design - search functionality searches files only, not folder names

test_scenarios.name: Partial text search
test_scenarios.description: Search using partial text should match files
test_scenarios.expected: Files containing 'bat' substring should be found
test_scenarios.actual: Found batch_image_3.png - partial text 'bat' matched 'batch' in filename

test_scenarios.name: Sort A-Z (Alphabetical)
test_scenarios.expected: Items should be sorted alphabetically A-Z
test_scenarios.actual: Items sorted correctly: Badges, Groups, Images, PermissionsTestFolder, Templates, ThisIsAVeryLong..., Users, WorkflowTestFolder (folders first, then files)

test_scenarios.name: Sort Z-A
test_scenarios.description: Sort items in reverse alphabetical order
test_scenarios.expected: Z-A sort option should be available
test_scenarios.actual: Z-A sort option is NOT available. Only options are: Last Modified, Date Uploaded, Alphabetical
test_scenarios.notes: Feature not implemented - no reverse alphabetical sort option in UI

test_scenarios.name: Sort by date (Last Modified)
test_scenarios.description: Sort items by last modified date
test_scenarios.expected: Items should be sorted by modification date
test_scenarios.actual: Items reordered by last modified date. Order changed from Badges, Groups... to Templates, PermissionsTestFolder, Groups... (most recently modified first)

test_scenarios.name: Sort by size
test_scenarios.expected: Sort by size option should be available
test_scenarios.actual: Sort by size option is NOT available. Only options are: Last Modified, Date Uploaded, Alphabetical
test_scenarios.notes: Feature not implemented - no sort by size option in UI

test_scenarios.name: Search with special characters
test_scenarios.description: Search for files containing special characters
test_scenarios.expected: Files with special characters should be found
test_scenarios.actual: Found 'test file (special) #1.txt' - search correctly handles parentheses and matches files with special characters

test_scenarios.name: Navigate folder hierarchy
test_scenarios.description: Navigate into folders and back using breadcrumb
steps: Click on 'Images' folder to navigate into it
Click 'Home' in breadcrumb to navigate back
test_scenarios.expected: Should navigate into folder and back using breadcrumb
test_scenarios.actual: Successfully navigated into Images folder (saw subfolders: Publisher, TestNewFolder2026, SecureFolderTest2026). Breadcrumb updated to 'HOME > IMAGES'. Clicked Home to return to root. Navigation works correctly.

observations: Search functionality only searches files, not folder names - this appears to be by design
Sort options are limited to: Last Modified, Date Uploaded, Alphabetical
No Z-A (reverse alphabetical) sort option available
No Sort by Size option available
Search supports special characters (parentheses, hash symbols)
Search results highlight the matched term in filenames
Breadcrumb navigation works well for folder hierarchy
Search requires 3+ characters to trigger (or empty to clear)
recommendations: Consider adding folder name search capability for better discoverability
Add Z-A sort option for reverse alphabetical sorting
Add Sort by Size option to help users find large/small files
Consider adding more advanced search filters (file type, date range, size range)
